entry.title: Lake Biwa Sunset・琵琶湖の夕日

link.title: Lake Biwa Sunset・琵琶湖の夕日

entry.content:
Sun reflects in the ripples of Lake Biwa, to the east of Kyoto. The small island in the distance is Takeshima Island.

琵琶湖のさざ波に太陽が反射する。遠くに見える小さな多景島だ。
entry.summary: Sun reflects in the ripples of Lake Biwa, to the east of Kyoto. The small island in the distance is Takeshima Island.

entry.title: Test Run・鶏鉾
entry.content:
The annual Gion Matsuri Festival is upon us, and for the next few weeks many Kyoto residents and visitors will enjoy the spectacle of the 34 yamaboko floats before the official parades on July 17 & 24.

After spending several days putting it together, members of the Niwatori Hoko float take it out for a test ride - of one block. This float has been a participant in the festival for more than 450 years.

毎年恒例の祇園祭が近づいてきた。7月17日と24日の公式パレードを含め、これから数週間、多くの京都市民や観光客が34基の山鉾のスペクタクルを楽しむことになる。

数日間かけて山鉾を組み立てた後、鶏鉾のメンバーが山鉾を試運転する。この山鉾は450年以上も祭りに参加している。
entry.summary: The annual Gion Matsuri Festival is upon us, and for the next few weeks many Kyoto residents and visitors will enjoy the spectacle of the 34 yamaboko floats before the official parades on July 17 & 24. After spending several days putting it together, members of the Niwatori Hoko float take it out for a test ride - of one block. This float has been a participant in the festival for more than 450 years.

entry.title: Bokeh in the Bamboo・竹のボケ

link.title: Bokeh in the Bamboo・竹のボケ

entry.content:
A vintage Nikon lens, wide open, creates bubbly out-of-focus highlights, in Arashiyama's Bamboo Grove.

嵐山の竹林で、ニコンのビンテージレンズを開放にして、泡のようなピンぼけハイライトを作り出した。
entry.summary: A vintage Nikon lens, wide open, creates bubbly out-of-focus highlights, in Arashiyama's Bamboo Grove.

entry.title: Dragon Cloud・龍雲
entry.content:
Sunlight breaking through the clouds created this dragon pattern, which I enhanced by editing the light and color.

雲間から差し込む太陽の光がこの龍の模様を作り出し、私はそれを光と色の編集で強調した。
entry.summary: Sunlight breaking through the clouds created this dragon pattern, which I enhanced by editing the light and color.

entry.title: Summer Evening・夏の夜
entry.content:
People enjoy the warm summer night on the Kamogawa River, in this long exposure from the Sanjo Ohashi bridge. The summer outdoor dining platforms are brightly lit up.

三条大橋から撮影した長時間露光で、鴨川沿いで暖かい夏の夜を楽しむ人々。夏の川床は明るく照らされている。
entry.summary: People enjoy the warm summer night on the Kamogawa River, in this long exposure from the Sanjo Ohashi bridge. The summer outdoor dining platforms are brightly lit up.

entry.title: First Light・曙
entry.content:
A long exposure at first light on the Oi River. A bright light illuminates the boats, and the mountain out of frame on the left.

大堰川で日の出前の長時間露光撮影。明るい光がボートと嵐山を照らしている。
entry.summary: A long exposure at first light on the Oi River. A bright light illuminates the boats, and the mountain out of frame on the left.
